name: There'll Be Hell To Pay
Lore: 'Luke''s dream of joining the Academy often distracted him from his chores, sometimes resulting in his having to pay the price for his impatience.',
Text: 'Use 3 Force to deploy on table and stack one just-played Interrupt here. To play any new Interrupt of the same name, player must first stack it here and use +1 Force for each Interrupt in stack, even if Interrupt is normally free. (Immune to Control.)',
